text: @GovMurphy Friend lost Mother a few moments ago. 70.... hasn’t felt well in weeks. Teladoc wasn’t cutting it. Waiting for a provider to see her. She’s gone. Stayed home because of Covid-19 per your instructions!  Weeks and weeks of waiting. How many lives has your overreach cost?
